class.name: UtilityAIBTRandomSequence
class.brief_description: Executes its child nodes in a random order until either all of the succeed (returning 1) or one of them fails (returning -1).
class.description: This node type is used to create sequences. The [UtilityAIBTRandomSequence] node executes its child nodes in a random order until either all of the succeed (returning 1) or one of them fails (returning -1). If a child returns running (0) the sequence will return running to its parent.
